00001 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 // File: SDKMesh.h
00003 //
00004 // Disclaimer:  
00005 //   The SDK Mesh format (.sdkmesh) is not a recommended file format for shipping titles.  
00006 //   It was designed to meet the specific needs of the SDK samples.  Any real-world 
00007 //   applications should avoid this file format in favor of a destination format that 
00008 //   meets the specific needs of the application.
00009 //
00010 // Copyright (c) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.
00011 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00012 #pragma once
00013 #ifndef _SDKMESH_
00014 #define _SDKMESH_
00015 
00016 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 // Hard Defines for the various structures
00018 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 #define SDKMESH_FILE_VERSION 101
00020 #define MAX_VERTEX_ELEMENTS 32
00021 #define MAX_VERTEX_STREAMS 16
00022 #define MAX_FRAME_NAME 100
00023 #define MAX_MESH_NAME 100
00024 #define MAX_SUBSET_NAME 100
00025 #define MAX_MATERIAL_NAME 100
00026 #define MAX_TEXTURE_NAME MAX_PATH
00027 #define MAX_MATERIAL_PATH MAX_PATH
00028 #define INVALID_FRAME ((UINT)-1)
00029 #define INVALID_MESH ((UINT)-1)
00030 #define INVALID_MATERIAL ((UINT)-1)
00031 #define INVALID_SUBSET ((UINT)-1)
00032 #define INVALID_ANIMATION_DATA ((UINT)-1)
00033 #define ERROR_RESOURCE_VALUE 1
00034 
00035 template<typename TYPE> BOOL IsErrorResource( TYPE data )
00036 {
00037     if( ( TYPE )ERROR_RESOURCE_VALUE == data )
00038         return TRUE;
00039     return FALSE;
00040 }
00041 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 // Enumerated Types.  These will have mirrors in both D3D9 and D3D10
00043 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 enum SDKMESH_PRIMITIVE_TYPE
00045 {
00046     PT_TRIANGLE_LIST = 0,
00047     PT_TRIANGLE_STRIP,
00048     PT_LINE_LIST,
00049     PT_LINE_STRIP,
00050     PT_POINT_LIST,
00051     PT_TRIANGLE_LIST_ADJ,
00052     PT_TRIANGLE_STRIP_ADJ,
00053     PT_LINE_LIST_ADJ,
00054     PT_LINE_STRIP_ADJ,
00055 };
00056 
00057 enum SDKMESH_INDEX_TYPE
00058 {
00059     IT_16BIT = 0,
00060     IT_32BIT,
00061 };
00062 
00063 enum FRAME_TRANSFORM_TYPE
00064 {
00065     FTT_RELATIVE = 0,
00066     FTT_ABSOLUTE,               //This is not currently used but is here to support absolute transformations in the future
00067 };
00068 
00069 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00070 // Structures.  Unions with pointers are forced to 64bit.
00071 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 struct SDKMESH_HEADER
00073 {
00074     //Basic Info and sizes
00075     UINT Version;
00076     BYTE IsBigEndian;
00077     UINT64 HeaderSize;
00078     UINT64 NonBufferDataSize;
00079     UINT64 BufferDataSize;
00080 
00081     //Stats
00082     UINT NumVertexBuffers;
00083     UINT NumIndexBuffers;
00084     UINT NumMeshes;
00085     UINT NumTotalSubsets;
00086     UINT NumFrames;
00087     UINT NumMaterials;
00088 
00089     //Offsets to Data
00090     UINT64 VertexStreamHeadersOffset;
00091     UINT64 IndexStreamHeadersOffset;
00092     UINT64 MeshDataOffset;
00093     UINT64 SubsetDataOffset;
00094     UINT64 FrameDataOffset;
00095     UINT64 MaterialDataOffset;
00096 };
00097 
00098 struct SDKMESH_VERTEX_BUFFER_HEADER
00099 {
00100     UINT64 NumVertices;
00101     UINT64 SizeBytes;
00102     UINT64 StrideBytes;
00103     D3DVERTEXELEMENT9 Decl[MAX_VERTEX_ELEMENTS];
00104     union
00105     {
00106         UINT64 DataOffset;                              //(This also forces the union to 64bits)
00107         IDirect3DVertexBuffer9* pVB9;
00108 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00109         ID3D10Buffer*                   pVB10;
00110 #endif
00111     };
00112 };
00113 
00114 struct SDKMESH_INDEX_BUFFER_HEADER
00115 {
00116     UINT64 NumIndices;
00117     UINT64 SizeBytes;
00118     UINT IndexType;
00119     union
00120     {
00121         UINT64 DataOffset;                              //(This also forces the union to 64bits)
00122         IDirect3DIndexBuffer9* pIB9;
00123 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00124         ID3D10Buffer*                   pIB10;
00125 #endif
00126     };
00127 };
00128 
00129 struct SDKMESH_MESH
00130 {
00131     char    Name[MAX_MESH_NAME];
00132     BYTE NumVertexBuffers;
00133     UINT    VertexBuffers[MAX_VERTEX_STREAMS];
00134     UINT IndexBuffer;
00135     UINT NumSubsets;
00136     UINT NumFrameInfluences; //aka bones
00137 
00138     D3DXVECTOR3 BoundingBoxCenter;
00139     D3DXVECTOR3 BoundingBoxExtents;
00140 
00141     union
00142     {
00143         UINT64 SubsetOffset;    //Offset to list of subsets (This also forces the union to 64bits)
00144         UINT* pSubsets;     //Pointer to list of subsets
00145     };
00146     union
00147     {
00148         UINT64 FrameInfluenceOffset;  //Offset to list of frame influences (This also forces the union to 64bits)
00149         UINT* pFrameInfluences;      //Pointer to list of frame influences
00150     };
00151 };
00152 
00153 struct SDKMESH_SUBSET
00154 {
00155     char Name[MAX_SUBSET_NAME];
00156     UINT MaterialID;
00157     UINT PrimitiveType;
00158     UINT64 IndexStart;
00159     UINT64 IndexCount;
00160     UINT64 VertexStart;
00161     UINT64 VertexCount;
00162 };
00163 
00164 struct SDKMESH_FRAME
00165 {
00166     char Name[MAX_FRAME_NAME];
00167     UINT Mesh;
00168     UINT ParentFrame;
00169     UINT ChildFrame;
00170     UINT SiblingFrame;
00171     D3DXMATRIX Matrix;
00172     UINT AnimationDataIndex;            //Used to index which set of keyframes transforms this frame
00173 };
00174 
00175 struct SDKMESH_MATERIAL
00176 {
00177     char    Name[MAX_MATERIAL_NAME];
00178 
00179     // Use MaterialInstancePath
00180     char    MaterialInstancePath[MAX_MATERIAL_PATH];
00181 
00182     // Or fall back to d3d8-type materials
00183     char    DiffuseTexture[MAX_TEXTURE_NAME];
00184     char    NormalTexture[MAX_TEXTURE_NAME];
00185     char    SpecularTexture[MAX_TEXTURE_NAME];
00186 
00187     D3DXVECTOR4 Diffuse;
00188     D3DXVECTOR4 Ambient;
00189     D3DXVECTOR4 Specular;
00190     D3DXVECTOR4 Emissive;
00191     FLOAT Power;
00192 
00193     union
00194     {
00195         UINT64 Force64_1;                       //Force the union to 64bits
00196         IDirect3DTexture9* pDiffuseTexture9;
00197 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00198         ID3D10Texture2D*                        pDiffuseTexture10;
00199 #endif
00200     };
00201     union
00202     {
00203         UINT64 Force64_2;                       //Force the union to 64bits
00204         IDirect3DTexture9* pNormalTexture9;
00205 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00206         ID3D10Texture2D*                        pNormalTexture10;
00207 #endif
00208     };
00209     union
00210     {
00211         UINT64 Force64_3;                       //Force the union to 64bits
00212         IDirect3DTexture9* pSpecularTexture9;
00213 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00214         ID3D10Texture2D*                        pSpecularTexture10;
00215 #endif
00216     };
00217 
00218     union
00219     {
00220         UINT64 Force64_4;                       //Force the union to 64bits
00221 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00222         ID3D10ShaderResourceView*       pDiffuseRV10;
00223 #endif
00224     };
00225     union
00226     {
00227         UINT64 Force64_5;                   //Force the union to 64bits
00228 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00229         ID3D10ShaderResourceView*       pNormalRV10;
00230 #endif
00231     };
00232     union
00233     {
00234         UINT64 Force64_6;                       //Force the union to 64bits
00235 #ifdef D3D10_SDK_VERSION
00236         ID3D10ShaderResourceView*       pSpecularRV10;
00237 #endif
00238     };
00239 
00240 };
00241 
00242 struct SDKANIMATION_FILE_HEADER
00243 {
00244     UINT Version;
00245     BYTE IsBigEndian;
00246     UINT FrameTransformType;
00247     UINT NumFrames;
00248     UINT NumAnimationKeys;
00249     UINT AnimationFPS;
00250     UINT64 AnimationDataSize;
00251     UINT64 AnimationDataOffset;
00252 };
00253 
00254 struct SDKANIMATION_DATA
00255 {
00256     D3DXVECTOR3 Translation;
00257     D3DXVECTOR4 Orientation;
00258     D3DXVECTOR3 Scaling;
00259 };
00260 
00261 struct SDKANIMATION_FRAME_DATA
00262 {
00263     char FrameName[MAX_FRAME_NAME];
00264     union
00265     {
00266         UINT64 DataOffset;
00267         SDKANIMATION_DATA* pAnimationData;
00268     };
00269 };

00279                                                  UINT iSizeBytes, DWORD Usage, DWORD FVF, D3DPOOL Pool, void* pData,
00280                                                  void* pContext );

00282                                                 UINT iSizeBytes, DWORD Usage, D3DFORMAT ibFormat, D3DPOOL Pool,
00283                                                 void* pData, void* pContext );

00285 {
00286     LPCREATETEXTUREFROMFILE9 pCreateTextureFromFile;
00287     LPCREATEVERTEXBUFFER9 pCreateVertexBuffer;
00288     LPCREATEINDEXBUFFER9 pCreateIndexBuffer;

00290 };

00292                                                      ID3D10ShaderResourceView** ppRV, void* pContext );
00293 typedef void ( CALLBACK*LPCREATEVERTEXBUFFER10 )( ID3D10Device* pDev, ID3D10Buffer** ppBuffer,
00294                                                   D3D10_BUFFER_DESC BufferDesc, void* pData, void* pContext );
00295 typedef void ( CALLBACK*LPCREATEINDEXBUFFER10 )( ID3D10Device* pDev, ID3D10Buffer** ppBuffer,
00296                                                  D3D10_BUFFER_DESC BufferDesc, void* pData, void* pContext );
00297 struct SDKMESH_CALLBACKS10
00298 {
00299     LPCREATETEXTUREFROMFILE10 pCreateTextureFromFile;

00520 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00521 // Name: class CDXUTXFileMesh
00522 // Desc: Class for loading and rendering file-based meshes
00523 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00524 class CDXUTXFileMesh
00525 {
00526 public:
00527     WCHAR       m_strName[512];
00528     LPD3DXMESH m_pMesh;   // Managed mesh
00529 
00530     // Cache of data in m_pMesh for easy access
00531     IDirect3DVertexBuffer9* m_pVB;
00532     IDirect3DIndexBuffer9* m_pIB;
00533     IDirect3DVertexDeclaration9* m_pDecl;
00534     DWORD m_dwNumVertices;
00535     DWORD m_dwNumFaces;
00536     DWORD m_dwBytesPerVertex;
00537 
00538     DWORD m_dwNumMaterials; // Materials for the mesh
00539     D3DMATERIAL9* m_pMaterials;
00540     CHAR        (*m_strMaterials )[MAX_PATH];
00541     IDirect3DBaseTexture9** m_pTextures;
00542     bool m_bUseMaterials;
00543 
00544 public:
00545     // Rendering
00546     HRESULT     Render( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pd3dDevice,
00547                         bool bDrawOpaqueSubsets = true,
00548                         bool bDrawAlphaSubsets = true );
00549     HRESULT     Render( ID3DXEffect* pEffect,
00550                         D3DXHANDLE hTexture = NULL,
00551                         D3DXHANDLE hDiffuse = NULL,
00552                         D3DXHANDLE hAmbient = NULL,
00553                         D3DXHANDLE hSpecular = NULL,
00554                         D3DXHANDLE hEmissive = NULL,
00555                         D3DXHANDLE hPower = NULL,
00556                         bool bDrawOpaqueSubsets = true,
00557                         bool bDrawAlphaSubsets = true );
00558 
00559     // Mesh access
00560     LPD3DXMESH  GetMesh()
00561     {
00562         return m_pMesh;
00563     }
00564 
00565     // Rendering options
00566     void        UseMeshMaterials( bool bFlag )
00567     {
00568         m_bUseMaterials = bFlag;
00569     }
00570     HRESULT     SetFVF( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pd3dDevice, DWORD dwFVF );
00571     HRESULT     SetVertexDecl( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pd3dDevice, const D3DVERTEXELEMENT9* pDecl,
00572                                bool bAutoComputeNormals = true, bool bAutoComputeTangents = true,
00573                                bool bSplitVertexForOptimalTangents = false );
00574 
00575     // Initializing
00576     HRESULT     RestoreDeviceObjects( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pd3dDevice );
00577     HRESULT     InvalidateDeviceObjects();
00578 
00579     // Creation/destruction
